actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain national forest lands in the State of Washington as the Cougar Lakes Wilderness, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Cougar Lakes Wilderness Act of 1979 - Designates certain lands in the Gifford Pinchot National Forest, the Mount Baker-Snoqualmie National Forest, and the Wenatchee National Forest, Washington, as the Cougar Lakes Wilderness, a component of the National Wilderness Preservation System.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain national forest lands in the State of Washington as the Cougar Lakes Wilderness, and for other purposes.
